comment:
logistics:Logistics refers to the detailed coordination of a complex operation involving many people, facilities, or supplies, such as the transportation of goods or resources.
units of water:Units of water refer to the quantity of water being transported, typically measured in liters or gallons per minute in this context.
minimize:To minimize means to reduce to the smallest possible amount or degree, in this case, to find the smallest total number of pipes required to meet the water transportation needs.
